MedicalCertificate - Class in models
Represents a medical certificate issued to a patient, containing details such as the reason, duration, issue date, and approval status.

Constructs a MedicalCertificate object with the specified patient details, reason, and duration.

Another Constructor that constructs a MedicalCertificate with detailed parameters for existing records.

Medicine - Class in models
Represents a medicine in the inventory, including its name, current stock, and the low stock alert threshold.
